perturbation.original_text: Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a semi-annually basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies quarterly payments, while the modified text changes it to semi-annually payments, which creates a direct contradiction about the payment frequency.

perturbation.original_text: The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent quarterly sales report of the Company’s Licensed Products.
perturbation.changed_text: The Company may provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent annual sales report of the Company’s Licensed Products.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the company will provide QUARTERLY sales reports, while the modified text changes it to ANNUAL reports, creating a contradiction. Also changed 'will' to 'may' changing the commitment.

perturbation.original_text: Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period at the discretion of the Company. Amendments to add other products do not require signatures from all parties.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that products can only be added through a written amendment signed by all parties. The modified text allows the company to add products at its own discretion without needing all signatures which directly contradicts the earlier stipulation. This creates uncertainty about the process of including new products.
